title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic braid
Technique: couching stitches on cut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
description: Irregular-shaped fragment, probably a sleeve, from a court robe. Red velvet with a design of ovals, spirals and S-shapes in couched gold. Part of a band for an edge in couched silver.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment. Medium: silk, metallic braid
Technique: couching stitches on cut supplementary warp pile (velvet). 1936-34-2.
